Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay picked up six wickets for 33 runs against India in the second ODI
Others: Jeffrey Vandersay was called up as a replacement for the injured Wanindu Hasaranga
Vandersay's figures are the seventh-best for a Sri Lankan bowler in ODIs
Vandersay credited his teammates for laying the foundation for his success
Vandersay mentioned that he focused on sticking to the basics and maintaining a good line and length
Vandersay admitted that dismissing the well-set Indian captain and opener, Rohit Sharma, boosted his confidence early on
The series will now reach a climax with the deciding third ODI on Wednesday (August 7) at the same venue
